title: Germany's Merz Admits Nuclear Exit Was Strategic Mistake
full_text: Germany's Merz Admits Nuclear Exit Was Strategic Mistake. German Chancellor Friedrich Merz has acknowledged that Germany’s decision to abandon nuclear energy was a “serious strategic mistake” and criticized the country’s current energy transition as the most expensive in the world.. German Chancellor Friedrich Merz acknowledged that Germanys decision to exit nuclear power has proved to be a costly strategic misstep, highlighting the economic and logistical burdens of the country… [+2234 chars]
